name: Parsonage
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The parsonage has a peaceful, spiritual atmosphere with the scent of incense and the sound of quiet prayers and religious study. The air carries the weight of divine service and the essential nature of spiritual guidance, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of religious devotion and the importance of pastoral care.
